title: Choral and Orchestral Ambiences
description: A collection of seamlessly looping choral and orchestral music for various moods. Includes 14 beautiful tracks, six of which are pure choir chants.
longDescription:
Choral and Orchestral Ambiences is a collection of seamlessly looping choral and orchestral music for various moods, from eerie to serene and action-oriented atmospheres. It includes 14 beautiful tracks, six of which are pure choir chants.

Preview of all songs is available at https://soundcloud.com/rytmigorilla/choral-orchestral-ambiences

Song list

(C=choir only, O=orchestral instruments only, CO=contains both voices and instruments):

  • (C) Ancient echoes 1 (2:05)
  • (O) Dawn (2:02)
  • (C) Old ages (2:17)
  • (CO) Pirates! Ho! (2:03)
  • (C) Celestial chant (1:51)
  • (CO) The hunt (2:03)
  • (C) Ancient echoes 2 (2:03)
  • (CO) Romance (2:21)
  • (O) In the caverns (2:03)
  • (C) Meditation (1:39)
  • (O) Village (1:43)
  • (C) Memory (1:48)
  • (CO) Sorrow (2:10)
  • (O) Last ships (1:44)

 

Total running time: 27:59
technicalDetails:
Total number of tracks: 14

Total number of sound cues: 14

Total length: 27:59

Intended platforms: All (tested on PC)
